document.full_text: art garfunkel said his voice is "slowly coming along" and predicted that he'll be able to hit the road again with paul simon soon -- possibly even before the end of the year.
document.title: art garfunkel hopes for simon & garfunkel 2011 tour
lines_and_colors: art garfunkel said his voice is "slowly coming along" and predicted that he'll be able to hit the road again with paul simon soon -- possibly even before the end of the year.
